gw.plugin.solr

Interface ISolrSearchPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ISolrSearchPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This class serves as a pluggable interface to allow free text searches for claims.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDefaultChunkSize()
      Gets the Solr page query chunk size configured for this plugin.
      int getPageIteratorCacheTimeout()
      Gets the Solr page query cache timeout in seconds.
      java.util.List<FreeTextClaimSearchEntity> search(ClaimSearchCriteria criteria, SolrSearchStore store)
      Search external Solr index for claims using the provided search criteria.
      java.lang.Object searchByClaimNumber(java.lang.String claimNumber, SolrSearchStore store)
      Search external Solr index for claims by claim number.
      SolrResultSet<FreeTextClaimSearchEntity> searchPaged(ClaimSearchCriteria criteria, SolrSearchStore store, int startsWith, int dynamicFetchSize, java.util.List<SolrSortColumn> sortColumns, int startRank)
      Incrementall search external Solr index for claims using the provided search criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.util.List<FreeTextClaimSearchEntity> search(ClaimSearchCriteria criteria,
                                                 SolrSearchStore store)
        Search external Solr index for claims using the provided search criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - the criteria for the search
        store - store to search (active or archive)
        Returns:
        the results of the search

      • searchPaged

        SolrResultSet<FreeTextClaimSearchEntity> searchPaged(ClaimSearchCriteria criteria,
                                                     SolrSearchStore store,
                                                     int startsWith,
                                                     int dynamicFetchSize,
                                                     java.util.List<SolrSortColumn> sortColumns,
                                                     int startRank)
        Incrementall search external Solr index for claims using the provided search criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - the criteria for the search
        store - store to search (active or archive)
        startsWith - first row for result set
        dynamicFetchSize - number of rows in result set
        sortColumns - which result columns to sort by
        startRank - starting user visible row number (may be different from startsWith if results are filtered)
        Returns:
        the results of the search

      • searchByClaimNumber

        java.lang.Object searchByClaimNumber(java.lang.String claimNumber,
                                     SolrSearchStore store)
        Search external Solr index for claims by claim number.
        Parameters:
        store - store to search (active or archive)
        Returns:
        the results of the search

      • getDefaultChunkSize

        int getDefaultChunkSize()
        Gets the Solr page query chunk size configured for this plugin. Defaults to 25.
        Returns:
        Solr page iterator chunk size, defaults to 25.

      • getPageIteratorCacheTimeout

        int getPageIteratorCacheTimeout()
        Gets the Solr page query cache timeout in seconds. Defaults to 5 minutes. -1 means iterator cache entries don't timeout, but they can be flushed for other reasons. New searches always start fresh. The cache is only while navigating back and forth within an iterator.
        Returns:
        Solr page query iterator cache timeout in seconds.
